meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Fix</kanji> the <kanji>diameter</kanji>. It is the wrong diameter and must be a new <vocabulary>diameter</vocabulary>. Test it now, what's the <vocabulary>diameter</vocabulary>?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
